casebody.data:
Patrick BARTON, et al. v. AVOYELLES PARISH SCHOOL BOARD, et al. No. 2014-CC-0989. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Sept. 19, 2014.

Prior report: La.App., — So.3d-, 2014 WL 1382549.

In re National Union Fire Insurance Company of Pittsburgh, Pa.; — Defendant; Applying For Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Avoyelles, 12th Judicial District Court Div. A, No. 2010-5032; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. 13-445.

Denied.

VICTORY and CLARK, JJ., would grant.
